title: Browsing context
summary: A browsing context is an environment in which a browser displays a Document. In modern browsers, it usually is a tab, but can be a window or even only parts of a page, like a frame or an iframe.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
